item.title: The Taskmaster's Potty Mouth
item.description: Your Task The Profanity Rate Approach Case of the Missing Profanities Putting on a Spread To Mean or Medianâ€¦ What Have We Learnt Today? ðŸ’¡ Warning This Post Contains Strong Language...Reader Discretion is advised! Your Task Find out whether the Taskmaster (Greg Davies) has become more or less foul mouth over time. This post is an extension of this profanity based post. The Profanity Rate Approach One way to answer our question is to use Profanity Rate that we previously defined in the aforementioned post.
